name: L/R and Ex1/Ex2 Item Switch
author: Lejes
info: Restores quick item switching functionality when quest rule "Can Select A-Button Weapon On Subscreen" is active.
description: The quest rule "Can Select A-Button Weapon On Subscreen" disables the L/R quick B button item switch. This script re-enables it for B as well as adding similar functionality to the Ex1 and Ex2 buttons for the A button item.
setup: Requires std.zh. If you have no other global scripts to combine with this, it can be imported as is and placed into the Global Active script slot.
